file_content.text: Little Sullustan fella's looking for you.
Them fortresses are keeping the whole galaxy down. Hope you figure out what makes them go away.
If it isn't the Alliance Commander, out here slumming it with the Imperial trash.
Just a little joke, my Jedi friend. Must be as weird for you as it is for me, all this working together.
Just breaking the ice--soldier to soldier, like. Having you in charge, it's... taken a small bit of acclimation, know what I mean?
Who am I kidding? More at home with us regular folk, I bet, someone with your history.
Look, we heard what you're getting up to, the massive risk you're taking for everyone. No one I respect more right now than you.
Everything's prepped, Theron and the little fella are ready. Go kill us a Star Fortress, Commander.
Back for more, are we? Must be making progress with those battle stations. I like to hear it. You all set?
That's the stuff, Commander. No Star Fortress left intact!
Okay, then. Drop by as soon as you're ready.
No Star Fortress left standing! That's how our Commander does it!
What I gather, our Commander here's making Zakuul pay in spades.
